publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-4385 Donald Gorrie: Regulatory Impact Assessment—That the Parliament calls on the Scottish Executive to co-operate with it in setting up a group to carry out a regulatory impact assessment of the regulations introduced by the European Union or the United Kingdom or Scottish governments, or by local authorities, NHS boards or other public bodies, with a remit to identify excessive, unnecessary and duplicated regulations and to press the initiating body to delete, improve or harmonise them.

S2M-4385 Donald Gorrie: Regulatory Impact Assessment—That the Parliament calls on the Scottish Executive to co-operate with it in setting up a group to carry out a regulatory impact assessment of the regulations introduced by the European Union or the United Kingdom or Scottish governments, or by local authorities, NHS boards or other public bodies, with a remit to identify excessive, unnecessary and duplicated regulations and to press the initiating body to delete, improve or harmonise them.
S2M-4385 Regulatory Impact Assessment (lodged on 11 May 2006) Mike Pringle*, Mr Andrew Arbuckle*
S2M-4385 Regulatory Impact Assessment (lodged on 11 May 2006) Mike Rumbles*
S2M-4385 Regulatory Impact Assessment (lodged on 11 May 2006) Michael Matheson*
S2M-4385 Regulatory Impact Assessment (lodged on 11 May 2006) Chris Ballance*
S2M-4385 Regulatory Impact Assessment (lodged on 11 May 2006) Dr Jean Turner*
S2M-4385 Regulatory Impact Assessment (lodged on 11 May 2006) Phil Gallie* Contents An A B C D E F G H I J
